description: Non-material amendments to reserved matters approval ref. 18/AP/1863 (Application for the approval of reserved matters (access, scale, appearance, layout and landscaping) for Plot H11B within Elephant Park (previously referred to as the Heygate Masterplan), submitted pursuant to the Outline Planning Permission ref: 12/AP/1092.  The proposals comprise the construction of two buildings of between 11 and 25 storeys in height (maximum building height 84.2m AOD) comprising 259 residential units, 285 sqm (GEA) flexible retail, office, community and leisure uses (Classes A1-A5/B1/D1/D2), cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, landscaping, new public realm, and other associated works). The proposed amendments includeChanges to the material of 'the knots' from glass to metalChanges to the material detailing of the tower balconies from back painted glass with glass balustrades to profiled aluminium facade with vertical metal slat balustradesBalcony changes to the mansion block from perforated metal to flat metal vertical slatsRemoval of planting from aluminium panel on the ground floor of the Heygate Street elevation Removal of planting on the canopies of levels 1 and 2 on the tower and revised canopy designIncrease in the size of the internal amenity area on level 24 of the towerNew substation locationAmendments to the Heygate Street residents entranceAmendments to the Park residents entranceRemoval of LV switch room to replace with cycle entranceRotation of retail unit to face Maddock PlaceRevised feature lighting on the towerAmendments to the roof terrace of the mansion blockAdjustment to the path and entrance to tower from park sideAlterations to the configuration of the residential units and Wind protection added to balcony 205 of the tower in response to submitted wind analysis.
site_name: Plot H11B Within Land Bound By Plot H11A And Elephant Park To The NorthRodney Place And Rodney Road To The EastHeygate Street To The South And Plot H7 To The West
